function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Misappropriation of medical materials due to lack of supervision and monitoring","Impact":"Wastage of critical medical resources and impeding response to severe pandemic situations.","Mitigation":"Implementing 5G-based live broadcast systems, IoT, and cloud computing for real-time monitoring and tracking of medical resources.","Technologies":"5G-based IoT, cloud computing, live broadcast technology","People":"Public, medical staff, patients","Owner":"Telecommunication companies, healthcare organizations, government"}]}
